title: Maria Goes to School
subtle: Personal Recount (fiction), 40 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L, Fiction Series
description: Maria Goes to School introduces readers to the print vocabulary for the names of familiar items taken to school. The familiar situation, repeated sentence pattern, and picture-to-text correspondence help early readers make meaningful connections.
meta: backpack, brother, crayons, eraser, hug, lunch, pencils, ride, ruler, sweater
Connect life experiences and use prior knowledge to understand text
Sequence Events : Order events from the story in sequence
Nouns : Recognize nouns as naming words
Categorize Words : Categorize words associated with school

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
